title: The Writer's Almanac - Monday, September 28, 2020
description: On this date in 1918, a parade to sell war bonds resulted in an epidemic of the "Spanish flu" that caused mass death in Philadelphia.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: On this date in 1918, a parade to sell war bonds resulted in an epidemic of the "Spanish flu" that caused mass death in Philadelphia.
